properties.name: jobScheduler.max-parallel-jobs
properties.description: Maximum number of scheduled Jobs to run in parallel.

properties.name: jobScheduler.pollInterval
properties.description: Max delay between checking if there are scheduled Jobs ready to be executed given as a Duration string.

properties.name: jobScheduler.exitWhenIdle
properties.description: If true, the application will exit when there are no more jobs to execute.

properties.name: jobScheduler.jobsEnabled
properties.description: Enables/disables individual scheduled jobs. Names are in the form <beanName>_<methodName>.
